title: Why can't I set a timer with Google Assist Headset Button while my phone is on the Pixel Stand?
content: When my Pixel 3XL is on the Pixel Stand and I press the Google Assistant button on my headphones to request a timer to be set the assistant says it is setting the timer but it does not.  If I take the phone off of the dock everything works as expected.  I have two different headphones that have a Google Assistant button and both of them show the same behaviour.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
